## ContractEvent type

Standardized return type for contract events that returns event arguments

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type ContractEvent<TEvent = Record<string, any>> = {
  eventName: string;
  data: TEvent;
  transaction: {
    blockNumber: number;
    blockHash: string;
    transactionIndex: number;
    removed: boolean;
    address: string;
    data: string;
    topics: Array<string>;
    transactionHash: string;
    logIndex: number;
  };
};
```
